member.name: EMRRESIZEPALETTE
member.summary: The EMRRESIZEPALETTE structure contains members for the ResizePalette enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRRESIZEPALETTE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRRESIZEPALETTE.ihPal
member.summary: Index of the palette in the handle table.

member.name: EMRRESIZEPALETTE.cEntries
member.summary: Number of entries in palette after resizing.
